6100.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6100.description: You are on a narrow trail winding its way between the enormous, grey trunks.  The crowns of the trees must be very dense, as they leave the forest floor in utter darkness.  The trail leads east and west.

north.description: A small shadowy path leads away to the north.

east.description: The narrow trail leads east to a somewhat lighter part of the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6101.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6101.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees whose grey trunks remind you of ancient pillars in a enormous, deserted hall.  To the south, a frail path leads away from the trail.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6102.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6102.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6103.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6103.description: You are where the dusty trail bends, as to avoid conflict with a colossal trunk to the west.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.  The trail leads east and south and there is a small path leading off the trail to the north.

north.description: A small path leads north off the trail.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6104.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6104.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  You feel as if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence.  The path continues north and south.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6105.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6105.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey trees loom all around you.  The path continues north and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6106.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest
6106.description: You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient grey trees tower above you on all sides.  Paths lead east, south and west.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6107.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6107.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey trees loom all around you.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

6108.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6108.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west and to the south, a frail path leads away from the trail.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6109.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6109.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6110.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6110.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  The trail leads east and south.  To the west, a narrow path leads away from the trail.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

west.description: The narrow path leads west between the giant trees.

6111.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6111.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way north-south between huge, ancient trees that loom ominously above you.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6112.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6112.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west and to the east, a frail path leads away from the trail.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

east.description: The path leads east - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6113.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6113.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey trees loom in all directions.  The path continues south and west.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6114.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest
6114.description: You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient grey trees tower above you on all sides.  Paths lead north, east and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6115.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6115.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  You feel as if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence.  The path continues north and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6116.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6116.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Giant, grey trees loom ominously on all sides.  The path continues east and south.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6117.name: A Junction In The Deep, Dark Forest
6117.description: You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient, grey trees seem to observe you silently you from all sides.  Paths lead north, east and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6118.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6118.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere.  The path continues south and west.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6119.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6119.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Huge, ancient trees are on all sides.  The path continues north and south.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6120.name: On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest
6120.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  To the south a fast river is flowing westward through the forest.  Ancient grey trees loom on both banks.  The path continues north and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

south.description: It looks as if you can enter the fast flowing river just to the south.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6121.name: A Dead End Path On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest
6121.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  The ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty roots.  To the south a dark river flows from east to west.  The only exit appears to be east.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

6122.name: A Small Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6122.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Giant, grey trees loom ominously all around.  The path continues east and south.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

south.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

6123.name: A Junction On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest
6123.description: You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient, grey trees seem to observe you silently you from all around.  To the south a dark river flows from east to west through the forest.  Paths lead north, east and west.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6124.name: A Dead End Path In The Deep, Dark Forest
6124.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  The ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty roots.  To the south a dark river flows from east to west.  The only exit appears to be west.

west.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.

6125.name: A Small Path On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest
6125.description: You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest. Ancient grey trees loom everywhere.  To the south a dark river flows westward through the forest.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.

east.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

6126.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6126.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west, and to the south a frail path leads away from the trail.

north.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.

south.description: The path leads south - away from the trail.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6127.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6127.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing close on all sides.  The trail leads east and south.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

south.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.

6128.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6128.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6129.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6129.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is ominously quiet.

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.

6130.name: A Narrow Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6130.description: You are on a dusty trail winding its way westward between huge, ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  The tree trunks seem to be covered in some sticky substance which gets much stickier towards the west!  Beware!

east.description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.

west.description: The sticky substance is hanging like ropes between the trees just above the path.  To the west the path seems to be covered with these giant threads covered with glue.  You can sense the forces of evil coming from the west and your bones tell you it may not be such a good idea to proceed.

6131.name: The Deadly Spider Web
6131.description: You are walking along the narrow path, ducking under the sticky ropes as you advance...  > A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! A huge, poisonous spider drops from above! A huge, poisonous spider drops from above!  > The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You resist the poison! The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You are poisoned! The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You are poisoned!  You are dead.

6132.name: Up In The Tree
6132.description: You are hanging on the outside of a huge tree trunk covered in a sticky substance.  Directly to the west is an immense spider web suspended between numerous of the giant trees including the one you are hanging on.  To the north is what looks like a large webbed entrance.

north.description: To the north is what looks like a large expanse of webbing which extends very far into the trees.

west.description: To the west is the immense spider web.  It seems to move softly.

down.description: Downwards is the narrow forest path.

6133.name: On The spider web
6133.description: You are balancing carefully on the giant sticky threads that holds the giant web in place.  To the east is a giant tree trunk and to the west is an entrance to a cave-like structure made from many layers of spider web.

east.description: To the east is the giant tree trunk.

west.description: To the west is the entrance to the cave-like structure.

6134.name: The Den Of The Queen Spider
6134.description: You are inside a cave-like structure that seems to be made entirely from countless layers of spider web.  Temperature and humidity is very high making it hard to breathe the foul air that lingers here.  The walls are covered with open cocoons.

east.description: Compared to this place the east exit looks inviting.

6135.name: A Dusty Trail In The Deep, Dark Forest
6135.description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey trees loom all around you.  The trail continues north and east.

north.description: The dusty trail leads north through the trees.

east.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

6136.name: A Dusty Trail In The Deep, Dark Forest
6136.description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient, grey trees loom everywhere.  The trail continues south and west.  A broad irregular path leads eastward away from the trail.

east.description: The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.

south.description: The dusty trail leads south through the trees.

west.description: The dusty trail leads west through the trees.

6137.name: At The End Of The Trail Through The Deep, Dark Forest
6137.description: You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey trees loom all around you.  A small trail leads northwards and the only other exit is east, along the main trail.

north.description: A narrow trail leads northwards through the underbrush.

east.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

6138.name: On The Narrow Trail
6138.description: The trail continues to the north and south as it leads through the heavy underbrush of this part of the Haon-Dor Forest.  Ancient grey trees loom all around you.  The brush seems to be bending closely over the path in a somewhat ominous manner, but you easily shrug it off.  The trail looks to open up somewhat a short distance to the south.

north.description: The narrow trail continues northwards through the underbrush.

south.description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.

6139.name: On The Narrow Trail
6139.description: The trail continues to the north and south as it leads through the heavy underbrush of this part of the Haon-Dor Forest.  The trail looks surprisingly well trodden along this part.  The brush seems to be bending closely over the path in a somewhat ominous manner, but you easily shrug it off.

north.description: A short distance to the north, you can see something shimmering.

south.description: The path leads southwards through the underbrush.

6142.name: Outside A Cave In The Deep, Dark Forest
6142.description: You are at the end of a broad, irregular path.  To the north is a very large ominous-looking cave opening.  The trees here have many marks as if something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.

north.description: The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.

west.description: The path winds its way westward.

6143.name: The Cave Of The Green Dragon
6143.description: You are in a big natural cave.  The floor is littered with bones of all sorts and the stench is so massive that you could cut it with a knife.  The only exit is to the south.

south.description: The exit leads out into the forest.

6150.name: The Narrow Trail
6150.description: This trail looks much spookier than any other that's you have seen.  The usual animal claw marks and bites on the trees are becoming few and far between.  The trail continues north.

north.description: The narrow trail continues north.

south.description: The trail intersects the main forest path.

6151.name: The Narrow Trail
6151.description: This area of the trail is also very peculiar.  You can see no signs of animal life what so ever.  The structure of the surrounding trees forces the path to make a sharp turn to the east.

east.description: The trail bends east.

south.description: The start of the trail.

6152.name: The Circle Of Trees
6152.description: The trees here seem to form a circle around the enormous tree in the center.  You notice a wooden door carved into the huge tree to the east.  The trail that you followed to get here seems to end at the base of the tree.

east.description: The tree door is carved beautifully.

west.description: The bend on the trail.

6153.name: Inside The Great Tree
6153.description: You have stepped inside of this hollowed tree.  From here steps lead down into darkness or you can exit the tree by going west.

west.description: The door is carved beautifully.

down.description: The steps look appear like they will hold your weight.

6154.name: The Underground Hallway
6154.description: This hallway is apparently one of the roots of the tree hollowed out. The hall leads south to a room where you hear strange noises or you can go up the steps.

south.description: The hallway looks quite grand.

up.description: The steps appear like they will hold your weight.

6155.name: The Cultist Temple
6155.description: This temple, built to a god you don't worship, is a nice place to visit but you feel very uncomfortable about spending any amount of time here.  The wooden altar seems to almost glow as you enter the room.  The only exit is the way you came in.

north.description: The hallway to the north looks quite grand.

6100.name: warg
6100.long_desc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6100.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

6101.name: warg
6101.long_desc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6101.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

6102.name: wolf
6102.long_desc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6102.description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

6103.name: wolf
6103.long_desc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6103.description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

6110.name: tree
6110.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
6110.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

6111.name: tree
6111.long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
6111.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

6112.name: dragon
6112.long_desc: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
6112.description:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as
does the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only
dragons do.

6113.name: spider
6113.long_desc: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
6113.description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It
has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

6114.name: queen
6114.long_desc: The huge, bulky Queen spider is here.
6114.description:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight
huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

6115.name: shargugh
6115.long_desc: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
6115.description:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and
long tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks
as if he is having great fun.

6116.name: elder
6116.long_desc: The Elder druid is here.  He looks very upset about your presence in his home.
6116.description:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think of him as venerable but yet you
know he would be a tough foe.

6117.name: isha
6117.long_desc: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.
6117.description:
She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair
shining like silver in the moonlight.  Her slender body is adorned
with a sleeveless shirt and a short skirt made from black scales
joined with silver threads.  Her back is covered by a large, hooded
cloak as black as her skin and in her broad silver belt hangs a long,
slender sword in a silver scabbard.

6101.name: sign
6101.room_desc: An old, battered sign lies on the ground.

6102.name: tree
6102.room_desc: A colossal tree blocks the way westward.

6103.name: branch
6103.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6104.name: branch
6104.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6105.name: branch
6105.room_desc: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

6108.name: coins
6108.short_desc: a big pile of gold coins
6108.room_desc: A big pile of gold coins is lying here.

6109.name: potion
6109.room_desc: A blue potion has been left here.

6110.name: potion
6110.room_desc: A yellow potion has been left here.

6111.name: shield
6111.room_desc: A large round shield has been left here.

6112.name: crown
6112.room_desc: An iron crown rests on the ground.

6113.name: sceptre
6113.room_desc: An iron sceptre lies on the ground.

6114.name: ring
6114.room_desc: An iron ring has been left here.

6115.name: star
6115.room_desc: the morning star is here collecting dust while it lies on the ground.

6116.name: shirt
6116.room_desc: A black dragon scale shirt has been left here.

6117.name: skirt
6117.room_desc: A black dragon scale skirt has been left here.

6118.name: cloak
6118.room_desc: A large, hooded cloak, as dark as the night, has been left here.

6119.name: belt
6119.room_desc: A broad silver belt has been left here.

6120.name: sword
6120.room_desc: A long, slender sword lies on the ground.
